items.sentence: Tom and Mary carried the injured man to the side of the road.
Tom and Mary got up from their seats and headed for the door.
I don\'t think Tom will ever be able to sing as well as Mary.
I don\'t think that Tom and Mary will ever get back together.
Do you remember the name of the paramedic that saved my life?
Tom walked into his apartment and closed the door behind him.
Tom wanted to travel and meet people from all over the world.
Tom was wearing a bulletproof vest, so he didn\'t get killed.
Company regulations mandate that workers wear safety glasses.
Not only was he a doctor, he was also a very famous novelist.
